verses.kjv: Fret not thyself because of evildoers, neither be thou envious against the workers of iniquity.
verses.ct: Don't get upset over those who do evil, and don't be jealous of people who practice wickedness.

verses.kjv: For they shall soon be cut down like the grass, and wither as the green herb.
verses.ct: They will quickly wither like grass and fade away like green plants.

verses.kjv: Trust in the LORD, and do good; so shalt thou dwell in the land, and verily thou shalt be fed.
verses.ct: Put your trust in the LORD and do what is right; then you will live securely in the land, and truly you will be provided for.

verses.kjv: Delight thyself also in the LORD: and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
verses.ct: Find your joy in the LORD, and he will give you what your heart longs for.

verses.kjv: Commit thy way unto the LORD; trust also in him; and he shall bring it to pass.
verses.ct: Hand your path over to the LORD; rely on him, and he will make it happen.

verses.kjv: And he shall bring forth thy righteousness as the light, and thy judgment as the noonday.
verses.ct: He will make your righteousness shine like the dawn and your justice like the midday sun.

verses.kjv: Rest in the LORD, and wait patiently for him: fret not thyself because of him who prospereth in his way, because of the man who bringeth wicked devices to pass.
verses.ct: Be still before the LORD and wait for him with patience. Don't get worked up over someone who succeeds through scheming or carries out wicked plans.

verses.kjv: Cease from anger, and forsake wrath: fret not thyself in any wise to do evil.
verses.ct: Let go of anger and abandon rage. Don't let your frustration lead you into doing wrong.

verses.kjv: For evildoers shall be cut off: but those that wait upon the LORD, they shall inherit the earth.
verses.ct: Those who do evil will be eliminated, but those who wait for the LORD will inherit the earth.

verses.kjv: For yet a little while, and the wicked shall not be: yea, thou shalt diligently consider his place, and it shall not be.
verses.ct: In just a short time, the wicked will be gone. You will look at where they once stood, and they won't be there.

verses.kjv: But the meek shall inherit the earth; and shall delight themselves in the abundance of peace.
verses.ct: But the humble will inherit the earth and enjoy an overflow of peace.

verses.kjv: The wicked plotteth against the just, and gnasheth upon him with his teeth.
verses.ct: The wicked scheme against the righteous and grind their teeth at them.

verses.kjv: The LORD shall laugh at him: for he seeth that his day is coming.
verses.ct: But the Lord laughs at them, because he can see that their day of reckoning is approaching.

verses.kjv: The wicked have drawn out the sword, and have bent their bow, to cast down the poor and needy, and to slay such as be of upright conversation.
verses.ct: The wicked pull out their swords and string their bows to bring down the poor and needy, and to kill those who live with integrity.

verses.kjv: Their sword shall enter into their own heart, and their bows shall be broken.
verses.ct: But their own swords will pierce their hearts, and their bows will be snapped in two.

verses.kjv: A little that a righteous man hath is better than the riches of many wicked.
verses.ct: The little that a righteous person owns is worth more than the wealth of many wicked people.

verses.kjv: For the arms of the wicked shall be broken: but the LORD upholdeth the righteous.
verses.ct: The power of the wicked will be shattered, but the LORD supports the righteous.

verses.kjv: The LORD knoweth the days of the upright: and their inheritance shall be for ever.
verses.ct: The LORD watches over the lives of those with integrity, and what they inherit will last forever.

verses.kjv: They shall not be ashamed in the evil time: and in the days of famine they shall be satisfied.
verses.ct: They won't be put to shame during hard times, and during seasons of famine they will have plenty.

verses.kjv: But the wicked shall perish, and the enemies of the LORD shall be as the fat of lambs: they shall consume; into smoke shall they consume away.
verses.ct: But the wicked will be destroyed. The enemies of the LORD will vanish like the fat of lambs burning away — they will disappear into smoke.

verses.kjv: The wicked borroweth, and payeth not again: but the righteous sheweth mercy, and giveth.
verses.ct: The wicked borrow and never repay, but the righteous are generous and give freely.

verses.kjv: For such as be blessed of him shall inherit the earth; and they that be cursed of him shall be cut off.
verses.ct: Those the LORD blesses will inherit the earth, but those he curses will be eliminated.

verses.kjv: The steps of a good man are ordered by the LORD: and he delighteth in his way.
verses.ct: The LORD directs the steps of a good person, and he takes pleasure in their journey.

verses.kjv: Though he fall, he shall not be utterly cast down: for the LORD upholdeth him with his hand.
verses.ct: Even if they stumble, they won't be completely thrown down, because the LORD holds them up with his hand.

verses.kjv: I have been young, and now am old; yet have I not seen the righteous forsaken, nor his seed begging bread.
verses.ct: I was once young, and now I am old, yet I have never seen a righteous person abandoned or their children out begging for food.

verses.kjv: He is ever merciful, and lendeth; and his seed is blessed.
verses.ct: They are always generous and willing to lend, and their children become a blessing.

verses.kjv: Depart from evil, and do good; and dwell for evermore.
verses.ct: Turn away from evil and do what is right, and you will live securely forever.

verses.kjv: For the LORD loveth judgment, and forsaketh not his saints; they are preserved for ever: but the seed of the wicked shall be cut off.
verses.ct: The LORD loves justice and does not abandon his faithful ones. They are protected forever, but the descendants of the wicked will be eliminated.

verses.kjv: The righteous shall inherit the land, and dwell therein for ever.
verses.ct: The righteous will inherit the land and live in it permanently.

verses.kjv: The mouth of the righteous speaketh wisdom, and his tongue talketh of judgment.
verses.ct: The righteous person speaks with wisdom, and their words reflect what is just.

verses.kjv: The law of his God is in his heart; none of his steps shall slide.
verses.ct: The instruction of their God fills their heart, and their feet never slip.

verses.kjv: The wicked watcheth the righteous, and seeketh to slay him.
verses.ct: The wicked spy on the righteous, looking for a chance to kill them.

verses.kjv: The LORD will not leave him in his hand, nor condemn him when he is judged.
verses.ct: But the LORD will not hand them over to the wicked or let them be condemned when they face judgment.

verses.kjv: Wait on the LORD, and keep his way, and he shall exalt thee to inherit the land: when the wicked are cut off, thou shalt see it.
verses.ct: Wait for the LORD and stay on his path, and he will raise you up to inherit the land. You will witness it when the wicked are eliminated.

verses.kjv: I have seen the wicked in great power, and spreading himself like a green bay tree.
verses.ct: I once saw a wicked person thriving in great power, spreading out like a flourishing native tree.

verses.kjv: Yet he passed away, and, lo, he was not: yea, I sought him, but he could not be found.
verses.ct: But then he was gone — just like that, he vanished. I searched for him, but he was nowhere to be found.

verses.kjv: Mark the perfect man, and behold the upright: for the end of that man is peace.
verses.ct: Pay attention to the person of integrity; observe those who are upright, because there is a future of peace for that person.

verses.kjv: But the transgressors shall be destroyed together: the end of the wicked shall be cut off.
verses.ct: But rebels will all be destroyed together; the future of the wicked will be cut short.

verses.kjv: But the salvation of the righteous is of the LORD: he is their strength in the time of trouble.
verses.ct: The salvation of the righteous comes from the LORD; he is their fortress during times of trouble.

verses.kjv: And the LORD shall help them, and deliver them: he shall deliver them from the wicked, and save them, because they trust in him.
verses.ct: The LORD helps them and rescues them. He rescues them from the wicked and saves them, because they put their trust in him.
